The website discusses the legacy of Jeremy Lin's NBA breakout, known as Linsanity, 10 years after it happened. It reflects on his sudden rise to fame, the barriers he broke, and the impact he made as an Asian American player. The article covers how Lin went from being undrafted to becoming a global superstar, focusing on his time with the New York Knicks in February 2012. It also delves into his journey through different teams and the struggles he faced before his breakthrough.
